mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_60_weather_forecast ( t, weatherCode, weatherName, ws, wd, updateTime ) VALUES
( #{item.t}, #{item.weatherCode}, #{item.weatherName}, #{item.ws}, #{item.wd}, #{item.updateTime} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_60_weather_forecast where SJWXHXPMC=#{SJWXHXPMC} and RKSJ = #{RKSJ}
